name: Acquire Digital, LLC
description:
Acquire Digital is a fully integrated digital advertising agency specializing in creating customized campaigns and marketing solutions that effectively connect with their audience. 
AD’s experienced and award-winning team offers a full spectrum of creative and digital services, which are customized for every project including web design, digital advertising, social media management and advertising, email list management, copy writing, data management, optimization, and persuasive advertising.
